hero.description: Junior web developer based in Montreal. I build modern web applications using React and JavaScript, with a strong focus on clean and maintainable code.

about.subtitle: Passionate Web Developer & Tech Creator
about.description: Hello, my name is Takahiro Asami. I am originally from Japan and currently based in Montreal. I am passionate about front-end development, particularly using React and JavaScript, while also having a foundation in back-end development. Curious and motivated, I enjoy learning new skills and working collaboratively with others.

frontend.title: Front-End Development
frontend.description: Building responsive and interactive web interfaces using React, JavaScript, and CSS.

backend.title: Back-End Basics
backend.description: Experience with REST APIs, Node.js, and databases such as MySQL, focusing on clean and maintainable code.

learning.title: Learning & Collaboration
learning.description: Motivated junior developer who enjoys learning new technologies and collaborating with team members.

contact.description: I am open to new opportunities as a junior web developer. If you have any questions about my projects or would like to get in touch, I would be happy to hear from you.

projects.description: These projects were built as part of my studies and personal learning. They allowed me to apply my skills in front-end and back-end development, and to better understand real-world application workflows.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: This personal portfolio website was developed to showcase my projects, skills, and background as a junior web developer. It brings together projects completed as part of my studies and personal learning, highlighting my interest in both front-end and back-end development. Through this portfolio, I aim to demonstrate my ability to build functional, clear, and maintainable applications, while continuously learning and improving my technical skills.

video-streaming.title: Video Streaming Platform
video-streaming.description: This video streaming platform was developed as a final school project. It allows administrators to manage YouTube video URLs stored in a MongoDB database and delivers content dynamically through a REST API using a React front-end.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Web Application
ecommerce.description: This e-commerce web application was developed using Symfony and follows the MVC architecture. It includes product management, user authentication, shopping cart functionality and order processing.

car-rental.title: Car Rental Mobile Application
car-rental.description: This car rental mobile application was developed using Kotlin and Android Studio as part of my studies. Users can browse available vehicles, select rental dates, and create reservations. All data is stored locally using an SQLite database, with built-in logic to manage availability, reservations, and date validation.

friendbook.title: Friendbook Social Web Application
friendbook.description: Friendbook is a social web application developed using C# and ASP.NET. Users can create accounts, log in, publish posts, and view a shared timeline. The application uses a relational database with Entity Framework and follows the MVC architecture, allowing for clean code organization and maintainable CRUD operations.
